message.error: A large description will not be displayed by aggregators. We recommend making a concise description, and attach the full one as a file. The field has a length limit, make sure that the entire text fits
message.warning: A large description will not be displayed by aggregators. We recommend making a concise description, and attach the full one as a file
message.warning-nda: We recommend making a concise description, and attach the full one as a file
message.error-nda: We recommend making a concise description and attaching the full one as a file. The field has a length limit, make sure that all the text fits

nda.title: Enable prequalification/NDA signing step
nda.sub_title: Vendors gain access to the request description after your confirmation

description_and_files.title: Description and files
description_and_files.placeholder: Specify the subject of your request...
description_and_files.add_files: Add terms of reference, specifications, draft contract, etc.
description_and_files.warning_text:
The documents are available to the supplying companies.
 Login or register a company on the platform.

contact_info.title: The contact person
contact_info.add_contact: Indicate a person for communication with vendors

delivery_address.title: Delivery address
delivery_address.add: Place of delivery of goods or services

tags.title: Tags
tags.add: Describe the subject of your request with keywords

enabled.notice: Specify the positions and rules for price changes
enabled.open: Open full specification of all positions

notice.true: Without specification of positions participants indicate the total price for the entire bid
notice.false: Specification for the items is not indicated. The total amount of the bid for the entire request is required

true.text: When enabled, the possibility to configure the item specification and price change rules will be available

false.text: When disabled, participants will be able to submit a total price for the offer

questionnaire.empty: Customize the vendor questionnaire, set non-price request conditions and criteria for comparison of bids
questionnaire.forbidden:
The information is available to supplier companies.
Login or register a company on the site.

gold.title: Bidzaar magic

text.message: Make the request simple, fast and efficient.
text.warning: It is impossible to disable magic after submitting the request

gold.on: Magic is enabled. The list of vendors is limited (the type of request is closed)
gold.off: Magic is disabled. The list of vendors is unlimited (the type of request is open)

registries.title: Vendors onboarding

text.1: Only onboarded vendors in the following vendor pools can submit a bid
text.2: Onboarded vendors are automatically invited to the request when the request is published
text.3: Vendors may be onboarded and prepare a bid

registries.empty: Vendor pools are not specified. Onboarding is not required to submit bids

empty.text: Your company does not have published vendor pools.

actions.message: Ask a question to the buyer
actions.change_acceptance_end_date: Change the deadline for accepting bids

blocked.title: Request details not available
blocked.sub_title:
The customer excluded you from the request. The request is limited to the number of vendors.
Have questions? Contact the customer.

message_payment.text: Bids submission is free, without deposits and funds blocking!
message_payment.link: What do I have to pay for?
